modName: No empty tag on empty containers
summary: This mod attempts to improve immersion by removing the tag that says \"empty\" on an empty container, letting you know it\'s empty (by some sort of hidden psychic power) before you even look inside!
descriptionHtml:
This mod attempts to improve immersion by removing the tag that says \"empty\" on an empty container, letting you know it\'s empty (through some sort of hidden psychic power) before you even look inside!

This latest version also removes the triangle icon as well - so there\'s no clue as to whether the container is empty or not before activating it.

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/hXQSy.png[/img][/url][/center]

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/31463-1-1365409339.gif[/img]

This mod was made on request and uploaded for that user and anyone else who may be interested.

What does this mod do?  It simply removes the text on the global \"empty\" setting for empty containers and should be compatible with all other mods that edit contents of containers.  The bsa file contains a transparent (ie. invisible) version of the triangle icon.


Thanks to: Mardoxx for pointing me in the right direction, and then providing the transparent dds to remove the triangle icon.  Thanks to Daedra__ for prompting me to look into this.


NOW ALSO AVAILABLE - NO PSYCHIC LOCK KNOWLEDGE, a companion mod which removes the visual tag that lets you know if a lock is apprentice, adept, master, etc. - now you need to try and pick the lock and judge the difficulty level yourself!  Get it from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/44115]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/44115[/url]
author: jackstarr and mardoxx

files.name: No Empty Tag on Empty Containers
